text:
DBI and DTIS shall provide a report to the Board of Supervisors every four (4) months for the next two (2) years following the effective date of this Ordinance No. 040539 regarding the status of its MIS update projects and the improvement of public access to the permit tracking system. 
(Added by Ord. 112-04, File No. 040539, App. 7/1/2004)
